scripts.migrate: sequelize model:create --name Product --attributes id:uuid,title:string,description:text,price:decimal && sequelize model:create --name Order --attributes id:uuid,address:string && sequelize model:create --name ProductOrder --attributes id:uuid,productId:uuid,orderId:uuid,quantity:decimal
scripts.resetdb: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
